A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was fantastic and deserves more than some of those half stars on the site. The acting was perfect and the development of the new and old characters really moved the story in a new direction that Lucas would never have the guts to move it to. The Last Jedi is really something special and unique and I believe is one of the best Star Wars films I have seen. It makes me happy that they didn’t reuse the Death Star plot that they have done it 1/3 of the movies. It’s fresh and bold in the direction that it moves the series.
